articles.description: The state government has pledged to rebuild and refurbish mental health facilities, after the ABC confirmed 19 adult mental health inpatients ended their own lives in Queensland’s care since 2018.
articles.content:

articles.title: Biden, Harris Erase Hersh Goldberg-Polin's Israeli Identity in Statements
articles.description:
President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris issued statements Saturday night on the murder of American-Israeli hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin, 23, that omitted the fact that Goldberg-Polin was also an Israeli citizen.
